website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive child's soccer shoe that has numerous sizes available for preteens.
pros: Good looking 2-colored shoes with multiple styles available
Mesh lining in these shoes helps keep feet cool
Soccer shoe provides nice feel and durability
Manufacturer even provides Toddler sizes for especially young soccer players
cons: Difficult to break in these shoes
Narrow fit won't work for some kids

customer_reviews.title: Good fit; hugs the ankle well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about soccer, but when my son wanted to play, we jumped at the chance to get him on a local team. I don't know about grip or if it helped with his running or anything like that, but I do know that these shoes stayed on his feet, unlike the cleats the other players were wearing. The games would need to be paused regularly for players losing their shoes, but my son never once lost his. For that, I think these are great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jinju

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good fit, happy w/my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my second graders club soccer. They are not the highest quality, but they are great for the price! The only thing that I have to compare them to would be a pair of Nike's. and I stated above they are not the highest quality but they will last through a rather vigorous Club season.. knowing the kiddos grow really fast, they are good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Poor design or flaw!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my daugher a pair of Vizari Vigo Soccer shoes black and white. When my daughter was walking and running funny during a soccer game and complaining of her legs and feet bothering her I checked her shoes and discovered that the bottoms were very flexible so much that the stubs on the bottom bend in causing my daughters feet to go in and which causes problems walking and running. Also where it laces it is off set which might also cause part of the problem too. I wished I would have noticed sooner. I ordered them because of the excellent reviews. I am very disappointed! Now I have to go out and buy here a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Great value shoe for little boys
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my 5 year-old! He is in soccer practice once a week and we did not want to spend too much on soccer shoes, but we wanted to ensure the shoe provided appropriate support and these did the trick! Plus apparently the green color is "in" right now. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are holding up quite well. Bought for 3 year old who started playing soccer. Bought a half size larger than he normally wears to make sure he has plenty of room for ankle pads and thick soccer socks. He loves the look and fit of these so much that he likes to wipe them down after each practice/game.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer2011

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time purchasing these. They fit perfectly and if my child continues soccer we will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan R Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great and didn’t cause any discomfort for my five-year-old. They were easy to put on and take off, and stayed on throughout the game. Held up to the eight week season with no issues, and I expect to be able to use them again in the spring. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy's own in Household

customer_reviews.title: Great value, clean simple look
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the price. Our 5.5 year old is doing baseball for the first time and these were perfect. They look sharp and simple. Quality is sufficient for the price. We also ordered a pair of Asics that were $32 but felt these were good enough for just 9 sessions of baseball. My son wears a 12 in Stride Rite and Saucony and the 12.5 in this shoe fit great with a bit of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for a season! My 9yr old liked the color and the feel of the shoes. The shoes survived the year and soccer season in great shape, and she could have used them for many more seasons if she wasn't growing so fast. Will be looking for a larger size this afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: SO glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered a big kid 5 and received a 5.5 instead. SO glad I did. They run a little small. My 8 year old is a 5W but these 5.5 fit ok - he won't get more than one soccer season out of them because his toe is pretty close to the front and his foot grows every season but well worth the price for a 10 week season of soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Bohorquez

customer_reviews.title: Would fit a thinner foot. My daughter had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Would fit a thinner foot. My daughter had a heck of a time breaking them in so I had to take them to the shoe repair shop to have them stretched in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Anna Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again every year
customer_reviews.text: Love these soccer shoes, they wear well and are durable. The only reason I purchase every year is because she out grows them, but because I order the black and white I pass them to her little brother. That's why I say their durable two children use them in two different years and they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Are made better than most adult cleats
customer_reviews.text: These Are made better than most adult cleats. I got the 1/2 size larger to accommodate my child's soccer socks. The cleat fit perfectly. We have 12 hours of "practice" complete and hours of running around the yard with these cleats and there are no frays or threads coming off the shoe. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my daughter. I said they could be worn comfortably for a couple of hours because they haven't been worn for more than that. Got a steal on these as well they dropped to $10 when I was ready to buy some cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer shoes for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are great soccer shoes, much nicer than those I grew up with. The cleats are rubber, not hard plastic, so my kids don't slide around on concrete. The shoe material is soft and yielding enough that they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: it is very good value.
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, work well on Gen3 turf (crumb rubber) and don;t hurt his feet. Stinky, for sure. Made of vinyl or something so not very breathable but he's going to wear these for about 4 months, tops. For the price, it is very good value.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my 3 year old! He has a small foot, so to find a shoe that held up and looked good in his size was difficult. The icing on the cake was the price. Would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are great cleats for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are great cleats for young kids. Wide build helps me squeeze my daughters foot along with the socks and shin guard ankle support in there no problems. The Nike and Adidas seemed to run narrow and these seemed like the perfect width.
customer_reviews.author: blznefx

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, they fit my boy perfect. They really helped during soccer training.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Rowland

customer_reviews.title: My daughter really liked these. She liked them for soccer and wore ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really liked these. She liked them for soccer and wore them after the games and practice for a bit so they must be comfortable. They were really cute and different too so she liked that too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: But my son liked them & they held up well so my younger ...
customer_reviews.text: Size 1 fit my 67# 50 inch 6 year old, but only for one summer soccer season-they run a bit narrow & small, very stiff. But my son liked them & they held up well so my younger son will use them when he grows older.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: but they are adorable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: These definitely run big...but its no surprise as most 2 year olds are not playing soccer wearing cleats. My son has a big foot but these still were large, but they are adorable and great quality. Will save again for next season!
customer_reviews.author: LEXELEX

customer_reviews.title: Little guy loved these.
customer_reviews.text: Great little cleats for the little one. No complaints, held up, fit right and made sure he wasn't wearing the same cleats as all the other little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat for the beginner soccer player
customer_reviews.text: Great cleat for the beginner soccer player. The shoe is flexible and soft unlike some of the very hard plastic cleats. They rinse off well and hold up practice after practice.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great!! I ordered a size up fom my ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great!! I ordered a size up fom my boys because of the thick socks they would wear and it fit perfectly!!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Marlize T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits big but cute nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work great for my 3yr old. I originally ordered a size 9 shoe which is my daughters standard size, but the shoe was extremely too big - her foot was coming right out the shoe. I exchanged them for a size 8.5 which fit a little better and allowed some room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Lady

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them. Was a little nervous after reading reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them. Was a little nervous after reading reviews the only reason I went with them was the color options and glad I did. Seem durable and made it through soccer 3 times a week for 2 months!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa stives

customer_reviews.title: Great little cleats for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My son has only worn these a few times so far but he loves them. They are softer than they appear and comfortable. They feel pretty sturdy as well. He loves the bright color too. Would highly recommend these for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these for her middle school games, and they were great. She liked the fact that they weren't like everyone else's, so they weren't getting mixed up with her peers. They fit great and took the abuse well.
customer_reviews.author: katwalk1978

customer_reviews.title: Great price :)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were cute, they seem well made and they look nice too. They've held up all soccer season and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ANON.

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and well made. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and well made. I bought it a little extra big for my son but it seems not that big. I think he will be ok for this soccer season though.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: She says they fit just fine and feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has worn these for about an hour at a time, multiple times a week for games and practice. She says they fit just fine and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 year old to play soccer in. Rain, mud and other cleats stepping on these, they are still going strong and probably will be able to use it again for next soccer season or even when our (current) 4 month old decides she wants to play soccer when she is 3 years old. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonaly Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes. These turned out to be super-comfortable for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. These turned out to be super-comfortable for my four-year old in her first year of playing soccer.
customer_reviews.author: artemishunter

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son wears it for the soccer practice. So far it meets the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: meisusu

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are good cleats. Would recommend for others
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are good cleats. Would recommend for others. We're using them for baseball as well. Not much cushion support though.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipitymom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't pay much-- well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for $8 to paint for a costume. Makes me wonder why I pay $80 for my son's "real" cleats but he said not as flexible. He did wear all day without complaints. Definitely worth $8!
customer_reviews.author: Jane  Stiegman

customer_reviews.title: NARROW and stiff
customer_reviews.text: Fit very narrow, and my daughter has rather narrow feet to begin with. Also, soles were very stiff. I admit, I have no prior soccer knowledge and this is my first time ever purchasing soccer shoes, so maybe this is normal? My daughter wouldn't wear them, though, so we returned them and hope to find something a little wider and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: much nicer than expected...
customer_reviews.text: these feel like a high quality shoe and my daughter, who is very picky about shoes, says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jerseydad

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my now 4 year old son and he has now worn them through 3 soccer seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Timeka

customer_reviews.title: This soccer shoe did not work well for my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This soccer shoe did not work well for my 3.5 year old. It has an inflated appearance and the sizing was much larger than the other cleats in the same size we tried. We returned these.
customer_reviews.author: superduo

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for my kid
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoe seemed to be there. But it was too narrow. Glad that I Was able to return the product, but am disappointed I needed to find a different soccer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AlF

customer_reviews.title: Wow my 2yr old grandson Noah will love wearing & playing in these Vizari soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: Wow my 2yr old grandson Noah will love wearing & playing in these Vizari soccer cleats! Made nice! Beautiful colors! You'll love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bitchatchi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for soccer. Exact color as pictured. Fits her foot and shinguard set-up.
customer_reviews.author: ilovetoread

customer_reviews.title: good soccer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not once complaint about these shoes. fit well, good quality for the money. loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Green and black soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: She has a narrow foot so these fit her really well. She loved how they fit and were comfortable for the whole practice and game.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First time for son to play soccer. Loves the shoes and the green is bright. Says they are comfortable. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: L. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look really good, just too big. Keeping for fall soccor when child's feet should be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: joe atwater

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Never bought cleats before so I read the reviews and wasn't disappointed. Only wore them around the yard so let's see if they last the season.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeJunkie

customer_reviews.title: soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses a size to big hoping my little girl can wear them for two years, she likes them andthey are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: taz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very young but never complained about her shoes... taking that as they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: baf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was above average quality and did a great job. I would, definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and it looks like we might get 2 seasons out of them
customer_reviews.text: Our boy loves these soccer shoes. They fit as expected and it looks like we might get 2 seasons out of them. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: letitgo11

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My daughter loves them. She's received a few compliments from her team mates.
customer_reviews.author: melissa preston

customer_reviews.title: they work great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: shoes are not meant to be worn all day. only during soccer play or practice. they work great for that purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Tottness Murph

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your kid has high arches maybe not the best choice
customer_reviews.author: Carma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The little girl I bought them for loves them so much she doesn't want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchases
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and the were everything we could ask for. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: s.ann

customer_reviews.title: Great kids soccer shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They aren't as stiff as most soccer shoes so that is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats for a growing foot
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great and they fit my 6 year old great. He feels cool wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter perfectly. Good quality and my daughter loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: coley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Fit well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mihova

customer_reviews.title: but they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has not worn them yet, but they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SSbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great soccer shoes for my daughter. She loves them and they look really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have used these for soccer and they have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: PositivelyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves the colors and how ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the colors and how they feel, she just hasn't started soccer yet so were waiting to try them out on the field.
customer_reviews.author: krys

customer_reviews.title: Great show for 3 yr old but I ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great show for 3 yr old but I ordered a 9M and was shipped an 8M. Thankfully they fit and he has some room in them. They will do for 3-4 weeks of his soccer practice/games.
customer_reviews.author: Chenire Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer but fit kind of narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4 year old for soccer. I didn't want to pay an outrageous price for soccer shoes when kids this age grow so fast. These were probably the most affordable looking and aren't made cheaply. They seem to be a bit narrow and hard for my child to put them on himself so I have to help him. These work so much better for soccer than using regular shoes, especially when it comes to slipping on the grass. The color is nice too, he has gotten alot of compliments on his soccer shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old has wide feet & these fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has wide feet & these fit him decently. He complains when we first put them on, but he knows they stretch out to be more comfy by the time we get onto the field. He played all season in them without much trouble. The laces are long enough, too, which I have found to be a problem with some athletic shoes. We did buy about a 1/2 size up to help with the width, which meant that he did lose a shoe once or twice during games. But, he's 4. It wasn't any big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Levity

customer_reviews.title: Great priced shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. A bit too big for our little soccer star.
customer_reviews.author: Serg B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these. Fit as expected and arrived just in time for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: Adorable for my little girl!! She loves them, and they are well made. They seem a little bigger/clunkier than my son's cleats in the same size, but hasn't caused any problems. I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah T.

customer_reviews.title: Child approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 year old. He loves them so much and wears them with pride!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 7 yr old daughter (lacrosse) she loves, the shoes fit her perfectly. She runs around a lot during practice and she tells me they are extremely comfortable and they do not hurt her feet. They are also very very cute and bright (we ordered the bright green). This is her second paid of Zizari cleats, she really, really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: McLean Mami

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 9year old loves them and is asked many times where they were purchased.
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Romer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son to use at age 5
customer_reviews.text: For price and usefulness! Perfect for my son to use at age 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and my little guy says they're comfortable. They've held up well and will last long ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a tricky time finding size 11 cleats for my four-year-old, but found these here. They're a nice-looking cleat, and my little guy says they're comfortable. They've held up well and will last long enough to be used by my younger kids when they're ready. They're a tad stiff and kind of tricky to get as tight as I want them, but that's getting better with use.
customer_reviews.author: NWI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a little to big on her, but she'll definitely be able to use next year
customer_reviews.author: Shauntel B

customer_reviews.title: My Son Adores His New Soccer Cleats!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable on my 4 year old son!! He is loving wearing his "super soccer cleats!"
customer_reviews.author: Dawn42081

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this is perfect to go
customer_reviews.text: If your kid's size is 2, you should order 3. Other than that this is perfect to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too big compared to the umbras we've had in the past
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the same size shoe he was wearing for school and they were just huge on him. The size down I had from last season were too tight but were a different brand. Still these seemed crazy big considering my son could have worn two pairs of regular socks and they still would have been too big. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but the size is about two sizes too small
customer_reviews.author: Pricop

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Perfect buy for a child who's starting soccer (futbol)
customer_reviews.author: Cortez Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: These cleats fit true to size, and look great on my daughter, who just started peewee soccer. They keep her feet planted, and she loves the hot pink accents.
customer_reviews.author: Vserduchka

customer_reviews.title: These are a good pair of soccer shoes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are a good pair of soccer shoes for a great price. I didn't want to spend a fortune for my daughter's shoes as they only play an 8 game season. These work great and she loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: cl johnson

customer_reviews.title: They r nice but way too big I bought them in her ...
customer_reviews.text: They r nice but way too big I bought them in her size. If u r going to get them a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Girl0516

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect for my 5-year old's taste and level. And SO cute!
customer_reviews.author: Raegan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for the price. Fits fine and my daughter loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes al hough they run a bit big in size.
customer_reviews.author: isela

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, and simply adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and simply adorable. - The sole is quite soft by soccer cleat standards, like a plasticized rubber, but that's probably a good thing considering the average age of the children in this size range. The color is vibrant and the contrast with the black accents makes it really pop. This is a "side-lacing" cleat, so if you're not used to cleats with an off-set lacing be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: ValdiNet

customer_reviews.title: received ADULT shoe instead!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the toddler size 9.5 shoe and received an adult size 9.5 shoe. I'm leery of re-ordering because I don't want to receive the wrong item twice.
customer_reviews.author: junipermaki

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these cleats! The material is very soft and comfortable! My 6 yr. old loves them and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, as soccer cleats should be tight to the foot. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great clear for my 5 year old. They were comfortable for her too.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size shipped.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Toddler Size 7 and was shipped the kids size 7...Its too huge for my son to wear. For some reason, the order as changed before shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Nayak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these. It's hard to find cleats in these smaller sizes
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: Vizari Vigo FG Soccer Shoe (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: Soft performance synthetic leather. Lightweight, durable and water resistant. Two color molded rubber for comfort and traction. Stitched at the front to the upper and riveted for added durability.
feature_bullets: Soft performance mid density polyurethane upper
Mesh lining for comfort and breathability
